GIDLIST.text:
/*%NOCOMMENT====================* REXX *==============================*/
/*  PURPOSE:  Display USS GID List                                    */
/*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
/* FLG  YYMMDD  USERID   DESCRIPTION                                  */
/* ---  ------  -------  -------------------------------------------- */
/* @LD  160519  LBD      Change to use Stemview for viewing           */
/* @A2  160323  R2221    Removed checking ZSCTPREF variable for WFS   */
/* @A1  110910  R2221    Allow executing on mutiple lpars/split scrs  */
/* @A0  110909  S54017   Created REXX                                 */
/*====================================================================*/
X        = MSG("OFF")

if syscalls('ON')>3 then do
    say 'Unable to establish the SYSCALL environment'
    return
end

row = 0                                                         /* @LD */

do forever
  address syscall "getgrent gr."
  if retval=0 | retval=-1 then
    leave
  gid=left(gr.2,8)
  row = row + 1                                                 /* @LD */
  t.row = "Group-Name="gr.1 "GID="gid "#members="gr.3           /* @LD */
  #m=gr.3
  do i=4 to #m+3 by 7
     do j=i to i+6
        if j>#m+3 then gr.j=''
     end
     l=i+1; m=i+2; n=i+3; o=i+4; p=i+5; q=i+6
     row = row + 1                                              /* @LD */
     t.row = "    "gr.i gr.l gr.m gr.n gr.o gr.p gr.q           /* @LD */
  end
  row = row + 1                                                 /* @LD */
  t.row = " "                                                   /* @LD */
end
t.0 = row

if sysvar('sysispf') = 'ACTIVE' then
   CALL stemview "View",'t.',,,"GIDList"                       /* @LD */
else do i = 1 to t.0
     say t.i
     end

UIDLIST.text:
/* --------------------  rexx procedure  -------------------- *
 * Name:      UIDLIST                                         *
 *                                                            *
 * Function:  List all Users and their UIDs by listing        *
 *            the /u/userid directories                       *
 *                                                            *
 * Syntax:    %uidlist                                        *
 *                                                            *
 * Author:    Lionel B. Dyck                                  *
 *                                                            *
 * Dependencies                                               *
 *            1. Stemview command                             *
 *                                                            *
 * History:                                                   *
 *            05/21/16 - Creation                             *
 *                                                            *
 * ---------------------------------------------------------- */
 /*   rexx   */
 call syscalls 'ON'
 address syscall
 'readdir /u root.'
 l = 4
 lo.1 = ' OMVS Userids for:' mvsvar('sysname')
 lo.2 = ' '
 lo.3 = ' 'left('Name',10) left('uid',10) left('gid',10) 'dir'
 lo.4 = ' 'left('-',10,'-') left('-',10,'-') left('-',10,'-') ,
           left('-',10,'-')
 do i=1 to root.0
    if left(root.i,1) = '.' then iterate
    'getpwnam' root.i 'pw.'
    l = l + 1
    if pw.0 > 0 then
       lo.l =  ' 'left(root.i,10) left(pw.pw_uid,10) left(pw.pw_gid,10) ,
                  pw.pw_dir
       else
       lo.l =  ' 'left(root.i,10) left('***',10) left('***',10) 'Invalid user'
 end
 lo.0 = l

 if sysvar('sysispf') = 'ACTIVE' then
    CALL stemview "View",'lo.',,,"OMVS Userids"
 else do i = 1 to lo.0
        say lo.i
        end
